value:
So many people from so many worlds
gather here... Tell me: What is the
scenery like where you're from?

I was raised in the Deeprealms, but
all my friends, and all those who
cared for me...$k$pThey all lost their lives when the
enemy struck.

Instead of walking your patrol route,
would you rather join me for a ride on
my pegasus?$k$pThink of it as...a stroll through the sky.
Besides, the wind up there is quite
refreshing.

Care to accompany me on a small
scenic tour? I want to remember
every detail about this world.

I was just drawing a picture. I think I
landed upon a fitting theme. It's a
great hero from another world...

I flew here to say hello and to let you
know that $Nf
is thinking well of you.

So this is what it's like on cloud
nine!

This calls for a song.
Aaaand a 1, 2, 3...

That was not my best
performance...

What beautiful power...
Thank you.

It's good to meet you. I'm Shigure,
Azura's son.$k$pI may be a skilled singer, but on the
battlefield I'll assist you with my lance
from atop my pegasus.

I'm glad you've come to see me. Do
you want my company on a mission?
Or perhaps to just look for a rainbow.$k$pI do enjoy being by myself, but
spending time with you is also quite
relaxing. Perhaps it's because...$k$pYou're not the chatty type.$k$pI have grown fond of you. I hope you'll
remember me even after we one day
part ways.$k$pNothing would make me happier than
if every time you glance at the sky or
hear a song, you think of me.$k$pPerhaps it's a bit selfish for a mere
Hero to ask for such a thing from a
Summoner, but it's simply how I feel.$k$pAnd I thought you should know.
はいっ
せいっ
うあっ！
This is bad...
It's showtime!
An encore? If you insist!
This show is over!
Time for my entrance.
The sky, so beautiful...
Heehee...
You are the ocean's gray waves...
Please...never forget me.
When I gaze at the majesty of the open sky, I feel so free. Don't you?
I'm not as skilled as my mother, but I do enjoy singing.
The scenery here is so beautiful... I want to pick up my paintbrush again. It's inspirational.
Tell me. When I leave here, will thousands of years have passed in my own world?
Would you walk with me sometime? You could tell me more about this beautiful world and about yourself as well.
All right.
I'm Shigure.
Shall we go?
